meanings.sent1: I had to uninvite my friend to the party because it was too crowded.
meanings.sent2: She decided to uninvite her classmates to the study session.
meanings.sent3: After realizing the small space, she had to uninvite some guests to the dinner.
meanings.sent4: The rain uninvited us from having a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent5: The sudden change in plans uninvited us from attending the event.

meanings.sent1: He had to uninvite his cousin to the wedding due to limited seats.
meanings.sent2: They had to uninvite the speaker for the event because of a scheduling conflict.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally uninvited the birds to its tea party.
meanings.sent4: The storm uninvited the guests from the outdoor wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected power outage uninvited everyone from the online meeting.
